steps.name: User click on Show all desktops
User should see all items are present in Desktop page
User click on Show all desktops
User click ADD TO CART option on 'HP LP3065' item
User click add to Cart button
User should see a message 'Success: you have added HP LP 3065 to your Shopping cart!'
User click on Show all desktops
User click ADD TO CART option on 'Canon EOS 5D' item
User click add too Cart button
User should see a message 'Succes: You have added Canon EOS 5d to your shopping cart'
User click on Show all desktops
User click on Canon EOS 5D item
User click on write a review link
user fill the review information with below information
User should see a message with 'Thank you for your review. It has been submitted to the webmaster for approval'
User click on Laptop & NoteBook tab
User click on Show all Laptop & NoteBook option

elements.name: Add and Remove a Mac Book from cart

steps.name: User should see a message ‘Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!’
User should see ‘1tem(s)-602.00’showed to the cart
User click on red X button to remove the item from cart
item should be removed and cartshould show ‘0 item(s)’
User click on Laptop & NoteBook tab
User click on Show all Laptop & NoteBook option
User click on product comparison icon on ‘MacBook’
User click on product comparison icon on ‘MacBook Air
User should see a message ‘Success: You have added MacBook Air to your product comparison!’
User click on Product comparison link
User should see Product Comparison Chart
User click on Laptop & NoteBook tab
User click on Show all Laptop & NoteBook option

elements.name: Adding and item to Wish list

steps.name: User click on heart icon to add ‘Sony VaIO’laptop to wish list
User should get a message ‘You must login or create an account to save Sony VAIO to your wish list!’
User click on Laptop & NoteBook tab
User click on Show all Laptop & NoteBook option

elements.name: Validate the price of MacBook Pro is 2000

steps.name: User should see ‘$2,000.00’price tag is present on UI.

comments.value: #Every feature file starts with Feature: <Name of feature file>
#Every Scenario starts with Scenario: <Name of Test case we want to automate>
#Gherkin keywords are Given When Then
#Given is precondition
#When is an Action taken
#Then is an expected result (usually we write validation)
#And is repeating an action or can be used following Given keyword as well
#But is used for negative scenarios verification
